trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Yukon
There were no other sightings in Yukon on or around December 4th 2000
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my friend went for a walk, we left my house at 7:00p.m. As we walkingbackto my house, we looked to the east, and saw this big,huge,black triangularshapedcraft,silently hovering. It looked like it was slowly rising up in the sky. Thefirst thing that got our attention,was thered lights that was pulsating acrossthe back end of this craft. We could see that there was blue, yellow, green andwhite lights that was pulsating on thebottom of it. Couldnt see direction oflights pulsating, due to trees in theway, so we ran back to my house, I got mybinoculars, ran back outside, and thecraft had slowly moved away, so we jumpedin my truck,and drove to S.W.29th andCzech Hall road. When we got there, thisobject had completely disappearedfrom sight...Thank you for your time andconsideration,SHELLEY L. RITTEROKLAHOMA MUFON FIELD INVESTIGATOR.
